item.title: CVE-2017-12542|2024-09-17T01:55:41.333Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- integrated%20lights-out%204%20%28ilo%204%29
item.description: A authentication bypass and execution of code vulnerability in HPE Integrated Lights-out 4 (iLO 4) version prior to 2.53 was found.
